why.description: State NovaOS purpose, philosophy, and identity

store.description: Store a memory item (semantic/procedural/episodic) with tags.

recall.description: Recall memory items filtered by type and/or tags.

forget.description: Forget memory items by id, tag, or type.

trace.description: Show lineage/trace info for a memory item.

bind.description: Bind multiple memory items into a cluster.

forge.description: Forge (create) a new module with mission and state.

inspect.description: Inspect a module's metadata and bindings.

bind-module.description: Bind two modules for cross-domain interaction.

snapshot.description: Create a snapshot of core OS state.

restore.description: Restore OS state from a snapshot.
